title: Enhanced color coding for Ralph output
description: Add semantic colors throughout Ralph output for better visual scanning.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Story ID colored by type (US=blue, V=purple, TEST=yellow, BUG=red, AUDIT=magenta)
Cost colored (green if <$0.50, yellow if <$2, red if >$2)
Success messages in green, errors in red, warnings in yellow
